channel.title: Can we have another weekly website competition?
channel.description:
Well i'm just asking because I wanna see what I can do myself. I know im a beginner at making websites, but I really wanna test my skills with everyone who enters :o.
heres a sample of my skills by the way: http://www.freewebs.com/project-lazy/ - first ever site by the way....

item.title: Can we have another weekly website competition?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

i steal my hosting from Cruel for free >.>

and my WAMP server for testing and quick developing (i hate ftp’s)

Read full topic

item.title: Can we have another weekly website competition?
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:12, topic:180352”]I pay for my hosting. FXdomains. I got a year of linux server, 350gb bandwith, 100gb of space. 1 free .com domain.

Cost me £20/year.[/quote]

Nice. I bought my hosting from Netfirms.
I’m on their Advantage plan. I used a RMN Codee to get it for 10$ p/y! ;D

item.title: Can we have another weekly website competition?
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

oh snap, i just realized my gimp not working… lol I could probably download photoshop for free anyways :P.

[quote=“goatee, post:9, topic:180352”]I just went through the code and you’re pretty good with CSS. I don’t know some of the stuff you do :(. I understand it though ;).

Also lol don’t be with zymic. Try one of the more popular ones, freewebs is fine for practice.[/quote]
What host you use? Also thanks, tooks lots of 1 day work to do lol

Read full topic

item.title: Can we have another weekly website competition?
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

www.ulmb.com

freehostia.com

Free Web Hosting - Linux, PHP, MySQL, No Ads/Banners by

FreeHostia offers free hosting services incl. an industry-best Control Panel & a 1-click installation of 50+ free apps. Instant setup. No forced ads.

(forgive me for suggesting ulmb, but anything to get him off freewebs!)

item.title: Can we have another weekly website competition?
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

Yeah. The colours fail. But there’s a lot of nice CSS in there.

If you clean it up, and gtfo freewebs, it’d be nice.

And, I was thinking this today.
A weekly website competition, all entrie’s must be put in on the 7th day, finished or not.
The prize is some sort of award etc.

item.title: Can we have another weekly website competition?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Wow you really don’t know much about colours do you?

Go to www.colourlovers.com and look at some of the website trends http://www.colourlovers.com/trends/websitecolors . It really helps if you don’t know what colours you want to use.
